item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, October 4, 2024 at 9:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Experimental web browser optimized for rabbit-holing (88 points | 17 comments)
2. Why does man print "gimme gimme gimme" at 00:30? (2017) (360 points | 139 comments)
3. Robert Dennard, DRAM Pioneer, has died (240 points | 21 comments)
4. 159 employees are leaving Automattic as CEO’s fight with WP Engine escalates (50 points | 32 comments)
5. Were RNNs all we needed? (363 points | 160 comments)
6. Patent troll Sable pays up, dedicates all its patents to the public (1020 points | 308 comments)
7. Canvas is a new way to write and code with ChatGPT (763 points | 554 comments)
8. The Silk Road (2023) (20 points | 1 comment)
9. Why and how we’re migrating many of our servers from Linux to the BSDs (163 points | 84 comments)
10. Perfctl: A Stealthy Malware Targeting Linux Servers (45 points | 10 comments)
11. MikroPhone: A privacy enhanced, simple and featured RISC-V mobile phone (132 points | 35 comments)
12. Personal Names Around the World (2011) (42 points | 18 comments)
13. Correcting the record for Continue and PearAI (95 points | 62 comments)
14. The Heart of Unix (2018) (118 points | 57 comments)
15. The Unraveling of Space-Time (65 points | 48 comments)
16. Skymont: Intel’s E-Cores reach for the Sky (44 points | 5 comments)
17. Why does Lisp use cons cells? (1998) (35 points | 19 comments)
18. Interviewing for Evidence (18 points | 7 comments)
19. New research says blue zones can be explained by comically flawed data (25 points | 3 comments)
20. Dance training superior to physical exercise in inducing brain plasticity (2018) (263 points | 142 comments)
21. UK will give sovereignty of Chagos Islands to Mauritius (178 points | 218 comments)
22. Show HN: Screensavers for your terminal (Bevy/Ratatui) (48 points | 8 comments)
23. HTTrack Website Copier (75 points | 16 comments)
24. Mux (YC W16) is hiring a video engineer ( | hide)
25. Improving Accessibility Using Vision Models (46 points | 11 comments)
26. Sequencing wastewater may be key to getting a grip on the H5N1 bird flu outbreak (36 points | 13 comments)
27. Magic Isn't Real (10 points | 2 comments)
28. Serving 70B-scale LLMs efficiently on low-resource edge devices [pdf] (225 points | 55 comments)
29. Determinism in League of Legends: Implementation (2017) (100 points | 43 comments)
30. X Corp loses court challenge over fine for child abuse material notice (6 points | discuss)
